		Question: Did the first Mass Effect game come out before the first Dragon Age game?
		Answer:
answer:
The answer to this question is the text below:

The first Mass Effect game released in 2007, while the first Dragon Age game released in 2009. Therefore, the first Mass Effect game came out before the first Dragon Age game; and the text provided outlines the chronological ordering of the two games.
